author: Simon Difford
description: Liquorice, chocolate, black tea and citrus. Equally as good enjoyed as an aperitif or digestive.
name: Hunter's Tea
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Brewed cold black breakfast tea

recipeInstructions.text: STIR first 3 ingredients until maple syrup dissolves
Add Jägermeister, STIR with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
